infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to record sparring videos. Recorded media are stored on your device locally and are not shared with the developer or third parties.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to record audio for sparring videos. Recorded media are stored on your device locally and are not shared with the developer or third parties.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow RollReview To Access the Camera?  Roll Review uses the camera to record sparring videos. Recorded media are stored on your device locally and are not shared with the developer or third parties.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow RollReview To Access the Microphone? RollReview uses the microphone to record audio for sparring videos. Recorded media are stored on your device locally and are not shared with the developer or third parties.
